body_html:
Assigning tf.Variable variables inside functions is not currently supported.

You can get around it by using tf resource variables, which are accessible by using tf.get_variable(..., use_resource=True) instead of tf.Variable to construct your variables.

I think declaring a resource variable outside the function will solve your problem.

body:
Assigning tf.Variable variables inside functions is not currently supported.

You can get around it by using tf resource variables, which are accessible by using tf.get_variable(..., use_resource=True) instead of tf.Variable to construct your variables.

I think declaring a resource variable outside the function will solve your problem.
